00031 #include "base/intmath.hh"
00032 #include "cpu/pred/hybrid_skew.hh"
00033 
00034 HybridBPskew::HybridBPskew(unsigned _localPredictorSize,
00035                            unsigned _localCtrBits,
00036                            unsigned _globalPredictorSize,
00037                            unsigned _globalHistoryBits,
00038                            unsigned _globalCtrBits,
00039                            unsigned _choicePredictorSize,
00040                            unsigned _choiceCtrBits,
00041                            unsigned _instShiftAmt,
00042                                                    unsigned _fetchWidth)
00043     : localPredictorSize(_localPredictorSize),
00044       localCtrBits(_localCtrBits),
00045       globalPredictorSize(_globalPredictorSize),
00046       globalCtrBits(_globalCtrBits),
00047       globalHistoryBits(_globalHistoryBits),
00048       choicePredictorSize(_globalPredictorSize),
00049       choiceCtrBits(_choiceCtrBits),
00050       instShiftAmt(_instShiftAmt),
00051       fetchWidth(_fetchWidth)
00052 {
00053     if (!isPowerOf2(localPredictorSize)) {
00054         fatal("Invalid local predictor size!\n");
00055     }
00056 
00057     //Setup the array of counters for the local predictor
00058     localCtrs.resize(localPredictorSize);
00059 
00060     for (int i = 0; i < localPredictorSize; ++i)
00061         localCtrs[i].setBits(localCtrBits);
00062 
00063     //localPredictorMask = floorPow2(localPredictorSize) - 1;
00064 
00065     if (!isPowerOf2(globalPredictorSize)) {
00066         fatal("Invalid global predictor size!\n");
00067     }
00068 
00069     //Setup the array of counters for the global predictor
00070     globalCtrs0.resize(globalPredictorSize);
00071     globalCtrs1.resize(globalPredictorSize);
00072 
00073     for (int i = 0; i < globalPredictorSize; ++i) {
00074         globalCtrs0[i].setBits(globalCtrBits);
00075         globalCtrs1[i].setBits(globalCtrBits);
00076         }
00077 
00078     //Clear the global history
00079     globalHistory = 0;
00080     // Setup the global history mask
00081     globalHistoryMask = (1 << globalHistoryBits) - 1;
00082 
00083     if (!isPowerOf2(choicePredictorSize)) {
00084         fatal("Invalid choice predictor size!\n");
00085     }
00086 
00087     //Setup the array of counters for the choice predictor
00088     choiceCtrs.resize(choicePredictorSize);
00089 
00090     for (int i = 0; i < choicePredictorSize; ++i)
00091         choiceCtrs[i].setBits(choiceCtrBits);
00092 
00093     // @todo: Allow for different thresholds between the predictors.
00094     threshold = (1 << (localCtrBits - 1)) - 1;
00095 
00096         //Shift amount is dependent on the fetch width and the instruction size in bytes
00097         totalInstShiftAmt = instShiftAmt + (unsigned)log2(fetchWidth);
00098 
00099         assert(HIST_SHFT_1 > HIST_SHFT_0);
00100         assert((unsigned)pow(2,HIST_SHFT_1) < globalPredictorSize);
00101 }
00102 
00103 void
00104 HybridBPskew::updateGlobalHistTaken()
00105 {
00106     globalHistory = (globalHistory << 1) | 1;
00107     globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void
00111 HybridBPskew::updateGlobalHistNotTaken()
00112 {
00113     globalHistory = (globalHistory << 1);
00114     globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00115 }
00116 
00117 unsigned
00118 HybridBPskew::computeLocalIndex(Addr branch_addr, unsigned positionInFetchGroup)
00119 {
00120         unsigned indx = (((branch_addr>>totalInstShiftAmt)<<instShiftAmt)+(Addr)positionInFetchGroup) 
00121                                         & (localPredictorSize-1);
00122         assert(indx < localPredictorSize);
00123         return indx;
00124 }
00125 
00126 unsigned
00127 HybridBPskew::computeChoiceIndex(Addr branch_addr, unsigned positionInFetchGroup)
00128 {
00129         unsigned indx = ((((branch_addr>>totalInstShiftAmt)^globalHistory)<<instShiftAmt)+(Addr)positionInFetchGroup) 
00130                                         & (choicePredictorSize-1);
00131         assert(indx < choicePredictorSize);
00132         return indx;
00133 }
00134 
00135 unsigned
00136 HybridBPskew::computeGlobalIndex0(Addr branch_addr, unsigned positionInFetchGroup)
00137 {
00138         unsigned mask = (0x1 << HIST_SHFT_0) - 1;
00139         unsigned globalHistory_loBits = (globalHistory & mask) << (globalHistoryBits - HIST_SHFT_0);
00140         unsigned globalHistory_hiBits = globalHistory >> HIST_SHFT_0;
00141         unsigned globalHistory_shifted = globalHistory_loBits | globalHistory_hiBits;
00142         unsigned indx = ((((branch_addr>>totalInstShiftAmt)^globalHistory_shifted)<<instShiftAmt)+(Addr)positionInFetchGroup) 
00143                                         & (globalPredictorSize-1);
00144         assert(indx < globalPredictorSize);
00145         return indx;
00146 }
00147 
00148 unsigned
00149 HybridBPskew::computeGlobalIndex1(Addr branch_addr, unsigned positionInFetchGroup)
00150 {
00151         unsigned mask = (0x1 << HIST_SHFT_1) - 1;
00152         unsigned globalHistory_loBits = (globalHistory & mask) << (globalHistoryBits - HIST_SHFT_1);
00153         unsigned globalHistory_hiBits = globalHistory >> HIST_SHFT_1;
00154         unsigned globalHistory_shifted = globalHistory_loBits | globalHistory_hiBits;
00155         unsigned indx = ((((branch_addr>>totalInstShiftAmt)^globalHistory_shifted)<<instShiftAmt)+(Addr)positionInFetchGroup) 
00156                                         & (globalPredictorSize-1);
00157         assert(indx < globalPredictorSize);
00158         return indx;
00159 }
00160 
00161 void
00162 HybridBPskew::BTBUpdate(Addr &branch_addr, void * &bp_history)
00163 {
00164     //Update Global History to Not Taken
00165     globalHistory = globalHistory & (globalHistoryMask - 1);
00166 }
00167 
00168 bool
00169 HybridBPskew::gSkewPredict(Addr &branch_addr, void * &bp_history, unsigned positionInFetchGroup, bool onDemand, bool &choice, BPHistory *history)
00170 {
00171     unsigned local_predictor_idx;
00172     unsigned global0_predictor_idx, global1_predictor_idx;
00173     bool local_prediction;
00174     bool global0_prediction, global1_prediction;
00175     //Lookup in the bimodal predictor to get its branch prediction
00176     local_predictor_idx = computeLocalIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00177     local_prediction = localCtrs[local_predictor_idx].read() > threshold;
00178         
00179     //Lookup in the global0 predictor to get its branch prediction
00180     global0_predictor_idx = computeGlobalIndex0(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00181     global0_prediction = globalCtrs0[global0_predictor_idx].read() > threshold;
00182     history->globalPredictorIdx0 = global0_predictor_idx;
00183 
00184     //Lookup in the global1 predictor to get its branch prediction
00185     global1_predictor_idx = computeGlobalIndex1(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00186     global1_prediction = globalCtrs1[global1_predictor_idx].read() > threshold;
00187     history->globalPredictorIdx1 = global1_predictor_idx;
00188 
00189         int predictionSum = (int)local_prediction + (int)global0_prediction + (int)global1_prediction;
00190 
00191     assert(local_predictor_idx < localPredictorSize);
00192     assert(global0_predictor_idx < globalPredictorSize);
00193     assert(global1_predictor_idx < globalPredictorSize);
00194 
00195         if (predictionSum >= MAJORITY_TAKEN) {
00196                 history->localused   = (local_prediction == true) ? true : false;
00197                 history->global0used = (global0_prediction == true) ? true : false;
00198                 history->global1used = (global1_prediction  == true) ? true : false;
00199                 return true;
00200         } else {
00201                 history->localused   = (local_prediction == false) ? true : false;
00202                 history->global0used = (global0_prediction == false) ? true : false;
00203                 history->global1used = (global1_prediction  == false) ? true : false;
00204                 return false;
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 bool
00209 HybridBPskew::lookup(Addr &branch_addr, void * &bp_history, unsigned positionInFetchGroup, bool onDemand, bool &choice)
00210 {
00211     unsigned local_predictor_idx;
00212     unsigned choice_predictor_idx;
00213 
00214     bool local_prediction;
00215     bool global_prediction;
00216     bool choice_prediction;
00217 
00218     BPHistory *history = new BPHistory;
00219 
00220     //Lookup in the local predictor to get its branch prediction
00221     local_predictor_idx = computeLocalIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00222     local_prediction = localCtrs[local_predictor_idx].read() > threshold;
00223 
00224     //Lookup in the global predictor to get its branch prediction
00225     global_prediction = gSkewPredict(branch_addr, bp_history, positionInFetchGroup, onDemand, choice, history);
00226 
00227     //Lookup in the choice predictor to see which one to use
00228     choice_predictor_idx = computeChoiceIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00229     choice_prediction = choiceCtrs[choice_predictor_idx].read() > threshold;
00230 
00231     // Create BPHistory and pass it back to be recorded.
00232     history->choicePredictorIdx = choice_predictor_idx;
00233     history->localPredictorIdx  = local_predictor_idx;
00234     history->globalHistory = globalHistory;
00235     history->localPredTaken = local_prediction;
00236     history->globalPredTaken = global_prediction;
00237     history->globalUsed = choice_prediction;
00238     bp_history = (void *)history;
00239 
00240     assert(globalHistory < globalPredictorSize);
00241     assert(positionInFetchGroup >= 0);
00242     assert(positionInFetchGroup < fetchWidth);
00243     assert(local_predictor_idx < localPredictorSize);
00244 
00245     // Commented code is for doing speculative update of counters and
00246     // all histories.
00247         bool prediction;
00248     if (choice_prediction) {
00249         if (global_prediction) {
00250                         updateGlobalHistTaken();
00251                         prediction = true;
00252         } else {
00253                         updateGlobalHistNotTaken();
00254                         prediction = false;
00255         }
00256     } else {
00257         if (local_prediction) {
00258                         updateGlobalHistTaken();
00259                         prediction = true;
00260         } else {
00261                         updateGlobalHistNotTaken();
00262                         prediction = false;
00263         }
00264     }
00265   //Addr tempPC = ((branch_addr>>totalInstShiftAmt)<<totalInstShiftAmt)+((Addr)pow(instShiftAmt,2))*(fetchWidth-1); //Create the addr of last ins in cacheline
00266   //if (prediction == true) { //TAKEN
00267   //    updateGlobalHistTaken();
00268   //} else if (branch_addr == tempPC && prediction == false) {
00269   //    updateGlobalHistNotTaken();
00270   //}
00271     /* testing if local predictor functions right */
00272         choice = choice_prediction;
00273     return prediction;
00274 }
00275 
00276 void
00277 HybridBPskew::uncondBr(void * &bp_history)
00278 {
00279     // Create BPHistory and pass it back to be recorded.
00280     BPHistory *history = new BPHistory;
00281     history->globalHistory = globalHistory;
00282     history->localPredTaken = true;
00283     history->globalPredTaken = true;
00284     history->globalUsed = true;
00285     history->choicePredictorIdx = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeChoiceIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00286     history->globalPredictorIdx0 = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeGlobalIndex0(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00287     history->globalPredictorIdx1 = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeGlobalIndex1(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00288     history->localPredictorIdx  = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeLocalIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00289     bp_history = static_cast<void *>(history);
00290 
00291     updateGlobalHistTaken();
00292 }
00293 
00294 void
00295 HybridBPskew::onDemandBr(Addr &branch_addr, void * &bp_history, unsigned positionInFetchGroup)
00296 {
00297   // Create BPHistory and pass it back to be recorded.
00298   BPHistory *history = new BPHistory;
00299   history->globalHistory = globalHistory;
00300   history->choicePredictorIdx = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeChoiceIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00301   history->globalPredictorIdx0 = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeGlobalIndex0(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00302   history->globalPredictorIdx1 = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeGlobalIndex1(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00303   history->localPredictorIdx  = invalidPredictorIndex; //computeLocalIndex(branch_addr, positionInFetchGroup);
00304   bp_history = static_cast<void *>(history);
00305 }
00306 
00307 void
00308 HybridBPskew::update(Addr &branch_addr, bool taken, void *bp_history,
00309                      bool squashed)
00310 {
00311     // Update the choice predictor to tell it which one was correct if
00312     // there was a prediction.
00313     if (bp_history) {
00314         BPHistory *history = static_cast<BPHistory *>(bp_history);
00315         bool historyPred = false;
00316         if (history->globalUsed) {
00317            historyPred = history->globalPredTaken;
00318         } else {
00319            historyPred = history->localPredTaken;
00320         }
00321                 // Update BP upon commit
00322                 if (!squashed) {
00323                         // Update the choice predictor to tell it which one was correct if
00324                         // there was a prediction.
00325                         if (history->localPredTaken != history->globalPredTaken) {
00326                             // If the local prediction matches the actual outcome,
00327                             // decerement the counter.  Otherwise increment the counter
00328                             if (!history->globalUsed && history->choicePredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex) {
00329                                 choiceCtrs[history->choicePredictorIdx].decrement();
00330                             } else if (history->globalUsed && history->choicePredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex) {
00331                                 choiceCtrs[history->choicePredictorIdx].increment();
00332                             }
00333                         }
00334                         if (!history->globalUsed) {
00335                            //Strengthen bimodal
00336                                 if (taken) {
00337                                         if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex)
00338                                                 localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].increment();
00339                                 } else {
00340                                         if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex)
00341                                            localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].decrement();
00342                                 }
00343                         } else {
00344                            //Strengthen gskew
00345                                 if (taken) {
00346                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx0 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global0used)
00347                                                 globalCtrs0[history->globalPredictorIdx0].increment();
00348                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx1 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global1used)
00349                                                 globalCtrs1[history->globalPredictorIdx1].increment();
00350                                         if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex && history->localused)
00351                                                 localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].increment();
00352                                 } else {
00353                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx0 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global0used)
00354                                                 globalCtrs0[history->globalPredictorIdx0].decrement();
00355                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx1 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global1used)
00356                                                 globalCtrs1[history->globalPredictorIdx1].decrement();
00357                                         if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex && history->localused)
00358                                                 localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].decrement();
00359                                 }
00360                         }
00361                 } else if (squashed && historyPred != taken) { //upon a branch lookup mis-pred - not btb mis-pred
00362                         if (history->localPredTaken == history->globalPredTaken) {
00363                                 //strengthen all predictors
00364                                 if (taken) {
00365                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx0 != invalidPredictorIndex)
00366                                                 globalCtrs0[history->globalPredictorIdx0].increment();
00367                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx1 != invalidPredictorIndex)
00368                                                 globalCtrs1[history->globalPredictorIdx1].increment();
00369                                         if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex)
00370                                                 localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].increment();
00371                                 } else {
00372                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx0 != invalidPredictorIndex)
00373                                                 globalCtrs0[history->globalPredictorIdx0].decrement();
00374                                         if (history->globalPredictorIdx1 != invalidPredictorIndex)
00375                                                 globalCtrs1[history->globalPredictorIdx1].decrement();
00376                                         if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex)
00377                                                 localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].decrement();
00378                                 }
00379                         } else {
00380                                 // Meta predictor update:
00381                                 // If the local prediction matches the actual outcome,
00382                                 // decerement the counter.  Otherwise increment the counter
00383                                 if (!history->globalUsed && history->choicePredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex) {
00384                                     choiceCtrs[history->choicePredictorIdx].increment();
00385                                 } else if (history->globalUsed && history->choicePredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex) {
00386                                     choiceCtrs[history->choicePredictorIdx].decrement();
00387                                 }
00388                                 if (history->globalUsed) {
00389                                    //Strengthen bimodal when gskew fails
00390                                         if (taken) {
00391                                                 if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex)
00392                                                         localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].increment();
00393                                         } else {
00394                                                 if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex)
00395                                                    localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].decrement();
00396                                         }
00397                                 } else {
00398                                    //Strengthen gskew when bimodal fails
00399                                         if (taken) {
00400                                                 if (history->globalPredictorIdx0 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global0used)
00401                                                         globalCtrs0[history->globalPredictorIdx0].increment();
00402                                                 if (history->globalPredictorIdx1 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global1used)
00403                                                         globalCtrs1[history->globalPredictorIdx1].increment();
00404                                                 if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex && history->localused)
00405                                                         localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].increment();
00406                                         } else {
00407                                                 if (history->globalPredictorIdx0 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global0used)
00408                                                         globalCtrs0[history->globalPredictorIdx0].decrement();
00409                                                 if (history->globalPredictorIdx1 != invalidPredictorIndex && history->global1used)
00410                                                         globalCtrs1[history->globalPredictorIdx1].decrement();
00411                                                 if (history->localPredictorIdx != invalidPredictorIndex && history->localused)
00412                                                         localCtrs[history->localPredictorIdx].decrement();
00413                                         }
00414                                 }
00415                         }
00416                 }
00417                 assert(history->globalPredictorIdx0 < globalPredictorSize &&
00418                            history->globalPredictorIdx1 < globalPredictorSize &&
00419                        history->localPredictorIdx < localPredictorSize);
00420     }
00421 }
00422 
00423 void
00424 HybridBPskew::histUpdate(Addr &branch_addr, bool taken, void *bp_history,
00425                      bool squashed)
00426 {
00427     if (bp_history) {
00428        BPHistory *history = static_cast<BPHistory *>(bp_history);
00429                 if (squashed) {
00430                         if (taken) {
00431                                 globalHistory = (history->globalHistory << 1) | 1;
00432                                 globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00433                         } else {
00434                                 globalHistory = (history->globalHistory << 1);
00435                                 globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00436                         }
00437                 }
00438        // We're done with this history, now delete it.
00439        delete history;
00440     }
00441 }
00442 
00443 /* use it when update() is called, but not histUpdate() */
00444 void
00445 HybridBPskew::histGarbageCollect(void *bp_history)
00446 {
00447     if (bp_history) {
00448        BPHistory *history = static_cast<BPHistory *>(bp_history);
00449        // We're done with this history, now delete it.
00450        delete history;
00451     }
00452 }
00453 
00454 void
00455 HybridBPskew::squash(void *bp_history)
00456 {
00457     BPHistory *history = static_cast<BPHistory *>(bp_history);
00458 
00459     // Restore global history to state prior to this branch.
00460     globalHistory = history->globalHistory;
00461 
00462     // Delete this BPHistory now that we're done with it.
00463     delete history;
00464 }
